explains: adj. 相互补充的，相辅相成的；互补色的；（基因序列、核苷酸等）互补的；（与）补充医学（有关）的；余角的，互为余角的
wordGroup: complementary product 补充产品；互补产品
complementary metal oxide semiconductor 互补金属氧化物半导体

sentences.en: He has done experiments complementary to those of Eigen.
sentences.cn: 他已经做了与艾根的实验互补的实验。

sentences.en: The team members have different but complementary skills.
sentences.cn: 队员技术不同但能互补。

sentences.en: The school's approach must be complementary to that of the parents.
sentences.cn: 学校与家长的教育方法必须相辅相成。
